api_excel module¶

class api_excel.File(name, type)[source]¶

Bases: object

Creates a File type object that allows you to read the data from the excel file you want to process.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name Output File

  • type (str) – Measure Line Type

createDirectories()[source]¶

Create directories method use to create folder output.

Parameters

  • path_origen (str) – Path where original file folder is.

  • path_folder (str) – Path folder generated.

  • path_output (str) – Path folder output inside folder generated.

  • path_excel (str) – Path excel files output inside folder generated.

  • path_images (str) – Path imgs files output inside folder generated.

getPathSlopes()[source]¶

readData()[source]¶

Reading of the data to be processed and stored in a .xlsx file with the function of the class File <<wiinoseLine>>

if the type entered by the user is 1 and <<ozoneLine>> if the type entered by the user is. The data is stored in

a variable of class “data”.If a suitable line type (1 or 2) is not received, the execution of the program ends

and informs the user of the error.

wiinoseLine()[source]¶

Get data from wiinose line and save that to “data” variable class File by means of <<export2Excel>> function.

api_excel.export2Excel(data, path, name)[source]¶

Create workbook in order to save data generated.

Parameters

  • data (str) – Path where original file folder is.

  • path (str) – Path folder generated.

  • name (str) – Path folder output inside folder generated.

api_excel.saveFeatures2Excel(data, path, name)[source]¶

Storage of the characteristics in a .xlsx file with a certain format and with the name of the gas from which these

characteristics have been obtained.

Parameters

  • data (List) – Features to storage

  • path (str) – Path to storage

  • name (str) – Name of File generated
